source:
TEXT_LUCKZG013_03498_SEQ_00 Quest Sync
Minebern looks as though he's about to tear his hair out.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG013_03498_SEQ_00特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト
トゥワインのマインバーンは、自分の代わりに風車の整備を頼みたいようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZG013_03498_TODO_00<tab>Slay a thistle mole and obtain its fat.
TEXT_LUCKZG013_03498_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the thistle mole fat to Minebern.
target: TEXT_LUCKZG013_03498_TODO_01<tab>マインバーンに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8F3601 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_LUCKZG013_03498_TODO_02<tab>Spread thistle mole oil on the windmill.
TEXT_LUCKZG013_03498_MINEBERN_000_000<tab>I tell you, this windmill gives me nothing but grief. The damned thing won't stop creaking!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG013_03498_MINEBERN_000_000最近、風車の具合が悪いようだ。
ときおりギシギシと嫌な音がする。

source: TEXT_LUCKZG013_03498_MINEBERN_000_001<tab>Putting thistle mole oil on the...moving bits at the top, makes it turn more smoothly, and I'd get up there and do it myself if I hadn't thrown my back out. Not to mention we've used up our supply of the stuff.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG013_03498_MINEBERN_000_001「」を、
てっぺんの軸受けに塗れば直るのだろうが、
私は怪我をしていて、風車を登れなくてな……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZG013_03498_MINEBERN_000_002<tab>Would you be willing to do it? There's coin in it for you.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG013_03498_MINEBERN_000_002手間賃は払うので、私の代わりに、
整備を頼めないだろうか？

source: TEXT_LUCKZG013_03498_MINEBERN_000_003<tab>It shouldn't be too hard to find thistle moles around here. Give them a few licks and they'll keel right over. Wringing the fat out is a pain in the arse, though. Once you've got a decent amount, bring it to me.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG013_03498_MINEBERN_000_003「」は、
「」から採れる。
手に入れたら、私のところへ持ってきてくれ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZG013_03498_MINEBERN_000_010<tab>Chasing around after thistle moles is not the sort of thing you want to be doing with a bad back, I tell you.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG013_03498_MINEBERN_000_010「」は、
「」から採れる。
手に入れたら、私のところへ持ってきてくれ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZG013_03498_MINEBERN_000_020<tab>Now there's a <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> who smells like <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var>'s skinned a mole or two.
TEXT_LUCKZG013_03498_MINEBERN_000_021<tab>Yes, that ought to do it. Give me a moment and I'll fix up a batch of the oil...

TEXT_LUCKZG013_03498_MINEBERN_100_021<tab>There you go, all ready. Now, be a good <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var> and climb to the top and spread this on the movey bits. Don't ask me what they're called, I didn't build the bloody thing!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG013_03498_MINEBERN_100_021「」ができたぞ。
これをてっぺんにある「」に使ってくれ。

TEXT_LUCKZG013_03498_MINEBERN_000_030「」を、
てっぺんにある「」に使ってくれ。
それで嫌な音も治まるはずだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZG013_03498_MINEBERN_000_050<tab>Good work. I'm not sure if the creaking had any negative effect on the mill itself, but it was bloody annoying!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG013_03498_MINEBERN_000_050おつかれさま。
これでもう大丈夫だろう。

source: TEXT_LUCKZG013_03498_MINEBERN_000_051<tab>I suppose you're wondering what we'd need a windmill for in the first place, seeing as we've no crops to mill into flour. It's actually used for drawing up water from deep underground.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG013_03498_MINEBERN_000_051この風車は、地下水を汲み上げるものでな。
乾燥した大地で生きていくには、
なくてはならないものなのだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZG013_03498_MINEBERN_000_052<tab>Of course, if anything were to go wrong, we'd have a serious problem on our hands, and it's my job to make sure that doesn't happen. Anyway, here's your payment. You've earned it.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG013_03498_MINEBERN_000_052風車を直してくれてありがとう、旅人よ。
私も早く怪我を治さないとな……。
